summary:
WHAT WAS LOST WILL BE FOUND,
WHAT IS BROKEN WILL BE FIX,
WHAT SMALL WILL BE BIG.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION

WHAT WAS LOST WILL BE FOUND,
WHAT IS BROKEN WILL BE FIX,
WHAT SMALL WILL BE BIG.



LOCATION

Head to Dunmeth Pass North East of Windhelm

VERSION 0.2
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________
_____________________________

RECOMMENDATIONS


Add bBorderRegionsEnabled=0 in the [General] section in Skyrim.ini.

go to Documents/My Games/skyrim/skyrim .configuration settings. and copy bBorderRegionsEnabled=0

This will remove the Border around skyrim

RECOMMENDATIONS DOWNLOADS

Conan Reworked Music at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49781/?" by muhfukka

MODS NEEDED TO PLAY KNIGHTSRETURN

PERMISSION RESOURCE

Knights of the Nine by maty743 at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18114 thank you for letting me use your great armor

Armoury of Conan by garymorrowind at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17177/?

The Call of The North Beta by guardian300 at http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18731/?

QUOTE
Last updated at 16:08, 25 Nov 2012 Uploaded at 15:33, 13 Jun 2012 Sorry
guys, the mod is dead, I do not have time to do this and realized that
to make a mod work properly is very difficult for someone inexperienced
like me, then you better leave it to someone who knows what do doing
this.

If someone want to continue these items, use or improve what I did to feel more comfortable without asking permission.

MODDERS RESOURCE
